name: MIND: Path to Thalamus
description:
MIND: Path to Thalamus is a puzzle game developed by Pantumaca Barcelona and Carlos Coronado. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Surprise Attack. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play MIND: Path to Thalamus on PC and Nintendo Switch. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop.
